qas.question: How many employees did IBM have in 2012?
What was the ranking in terms of market cap for IBM in 2012?
In 2011 Forbes, by revenue, ranked IBM at what rank globally?
At what rank was IBM rated as a global brand by Interbrand?
In 2012 Fortune ranked the largest US firms by number employees, what was IBMs rank?
How many employees did Forbes have in 2012?
How was Forbes ranked as far as number of employees in 2012?
How profitable was Forbes considered in 2012?

plausible_answers.text: the nineteenth largest firm in terms of revenue

qas.question: What rank did Forbes have in terms of revenue in 2012?
How was Forbes ranked globally for revenue in 2011?

context: In 2012, Fortune ranked IBM <b6_0>the <a4_0>second largest<a4_0/> U.S. firm<b6_0/> in terms of number of employees (<a0_0><b5_0>435,000 worldwide<b5_0/><a0_0/>), the <a1_0>fourth largest<a1_0/> in terms of market capitalization, <b7_0>the ninth most profitable<b7_0/>, and <b8_0>the nineteenth largest firm in terms of revenue<b8_0/>. Globally, the company was ranked <b9_0>the <a2_0>31st largest<b9_0/><a2_0/> in terms of revenue by Forbes for 2011. Other rankings for 2011/2012 include №1 company for leaders (Fortune), №1 green company in the United States (Newsweek), <a3_0>№2<a3_0/> best global brand (Interbrand), №2 most respected company (Barron's), №5 most admired company (Fortune), and №18 most innovative company (Fast Company).
